article_title: The New Normal of Healthcare Spending

article_metadata.author: John Mauldin

og.description: Below is the June 29th "Thoughts from the Frontline" newsletter, republished in full.   A rather interesting shockwave came across the newsfeeds this week. I was actually doing a TV interview when the host announced that GDP was down 2.9% for the first quarter. There was not much else I could do [...]
